detail_desc: Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a press-stud at the waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a press-stud at the waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Wide blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Wide blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.

Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and discreet pockets in the side seams. Recycled polyester lining.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.

5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with a ribbed section inside the back of the waistband and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.

Round-necked jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a straight hem.

Platform pool shoes with a wide elastic strap over the foot and fluted soles. Platform front 4.5 cm. Platform back 7 cm.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Dungarees in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details. Relaxed fit with adjustable straps that meet at the back, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets and tapered legs. The dungarees are made partly from recycled cotton.

Short skirt in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric layered over short sports tights. The skirt has a wide, bonded waistband with a scalloped edge that holds in and shapes the waist. The sports tights have a handy mobile phone pocket on one leg. Some of the polyester content of the skirt is recycled.

Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and a flounce with narrow, concealed elastication at the top. Elasticated seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist, and side pockets.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathered shoulder seams and narrow elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a layered skirt. Jersey lining.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud and a yoke front and back. Long sleeves with an opening and buttons at the cuffs, and a detachable waist belt with D-rings. Unlined.
Ankle-length skirt in an airy silk and cotton blend. High, gathered waist with covered elastication and a seam lower down the skirt with narrow, gathered smocking for added volume. Unlined.

Shorts in pima cotton twill with a high waist and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and slightly wider legs with pleats at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
